segments.text: I see the two children conspiring together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is actively plundering the cookie jar, a plate in his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister waits patiently below, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so innocent in their secret operation, yet so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself smiling at their cleverness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way they're so focused on those cookies is quite endearing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope that stool doesn't give way on him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely lost in her dish-drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The moment she does, though, there will be quite a scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder who will get caught first, the flood or the cookie thieves?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is certainly an interesting household dynamic.
segments.speaker: PAR
